tweet: Towards Open Collaboration: #IOTA is now a member of @Linuxfoundation! We are excited to collaborate in this open-source edge initiative with @LF_Edge, @EdgeXFoundry, and @Hyperledger as we continue our expansion in Europe and the US.  https://t.co/N0dzRXPsVa

The #IOTA Foundation is very excited to join @EdgeXFoundry as well as the @linuxfoundation! This is a very important step towards broader open-source collaboration and adoption in IoT. Only together we can truly build a scalable, secure and trusted future together.  https://t.co/j79IrxbU6l
#IOTA is now member of the Linux Foundation.  IOTA solved the scalability trilemma. IOTA has no fees, no mining and a badass vision for solving real-world problems.  Imagine where we are in 2 years.
